Name: Alpha & Beta
About the game: Game Summary: Alpha & Beta is a 2d platform game for those who love old platform games but with a few touches on this old style, the most important features are the high degree of difficulty and the promise of a satisfying gaming experience with a long gameplay time Story Summary: Alpha and Beta are two brothers, but because of Alpha's greed and efficacy, the two brothers became hostile to each other and challenged each other to death. Let's see who's winning... Game Features: - 9 worlds, 36 levels, 4 special levels and 8 boss fight - 19 different enemies, lot of traps and a some puzzling - A satisfying gaming experience with a high level of difficulty - Compatible graphics and music that will allow you to easily enter the atmosphere of the game - Simple controls - 7 powerups and 4 powerdowns - Average gameplay time: 30 hours Why You Should Play This Game: - Old style games blend with modern style games - Removed the disliked features of old style games - Added original mechanics to the platform type - Long gameplay time and a challenging but enjoyable gaming experience - Level designs that do not repeat themselves and keep a high level of curiosity - If you are looking for a platform game with regular updates this game is for you Note on Advanced Settings: Advanced settings can be found in the options.ini file where the game is installed, we recommend that you change it according to the following notes CreateTextureOnDemand = Do not change the value if your performance does not drop AlternateSyncMethod = Do not change the value! VertexBufferMethod = FPS i is the lockout setting but may cause delays, do not change the value if your performance is not falling SleepMargin = Give your value to 1 if your system is very bad, give 5 if bad, give 10 if normal, give good value of 15, give 20 if it is very good, default value is 10(Note: Do not change the value if you do not have a negative performance) Note: We recommend that you read the help when you first open the game Note2: Please read 'about save fies' announcements
